text:
Great you are learning from Billie. Say hi! 
I can write you at a later date in more detail about suggestions of what to include on a showreel. Though I unfortunately don’t know the Korean market. 
I wasn’t sure if you were Korean when Dexter refereed you to me. 
May I ask why you want to move to Korea? 

These is probably more vfx work in London :wink: and you would get great experience and advance your skills faster here on more high end projects (commercials, films, and/or episodic tv series ). Then move to Korea with already more experience in the industry. 

Also do you need a work permit for Korea?
